participant_1.name: Maya
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and optimistic, she embraces the challenges of motherhood while adapting to new environments.
participant_1.background: i am expecting triplets in three months. i recently moved to this country. a already have a step children. i work at a school.

participant_2.name: Chloe
participant_2.personality: Energetic and fun-loving, she enjoys staying trendy and spends her free time indulging in music and gaming.
participant_2.background: i love wearing skinny jeans and leggings. i am a blonde girl with really short hair. my favorite hobbies are listening to music and playing video games. my favorite shirts are band shirts and ruffle sleeves.
